languages.text: "Скьядди же, Думающий Дважды, был послан нам Всеотцом, чтобы не сложили мы головы молодыми щенками. Мыслей в его голове было столько, что хватало их думать и за меня, и за Арнульфа. Это Скьядди научил меня слагать висы. Духи ценили его мудрость, руны слушались его голоса".

"Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes hearkened to his voice."
languages.original_text: "Скьядди же, Думающий Дважды, был послан нам Всеотцом, чтобы не сложили мы головы молодыми щенками. Мыслей в его голове было столько, что хватало их думать и за меня, и за Арнульфа. Это Скьядди научил меня слагать висы. Духи ценили его мудрость, руны слушались его голоса".

traits.locale_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose visur. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes harkened to his voice."

It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose visur. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes harkened to his voice."

It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose visur. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes harkened to his voice."

"Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes harkened to his voice."

languages.text: «Skyaddi el Pensador Concienzudo nos fue enviado por el Padre de todas las cosas para asegurarse de que no moríamos jóvenes. Tenía suficientes ideas en la cabeza como para compensar mi atolondramiento y el de Arnoolf. Fue Skyaddi quien me enseñó a componer versos. Los espíritus valoraban su sabiduría y las runas escuchaban su voz».
languages.original_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes hearkened to his voice."

traits.locale_text: «Skyaddi el Pensador Concienzudo nos fue enviado por el Padre de todas las cosas para asegurarse de que no moríamos jóvenes. Tenía suficientes ideas en la cabeza como para compensar mi atolondramiento y el de Arnoolf. Fue Skyaddi quien me enseñó a componer versos. Los espíritus valoraban su sabiduría y las runas escuchaban su voz».

languages.text: “‘三思者’海加迪，这么说吧，他是全父派来保护我们的，以免我们在幼崽时期夭折。他的脑中有许多智慧，可以满足我和阿努尔夫的需求，是海加迪教会了我写诗。那些精魂珍视他的智慧，符文也愿意倾听他的声音。”
languages.original_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes hearkened to his voice."

traits.locale_text: “‘三思者’海加迪，这么说吧，他是全父派来保护我们的，以免我们在幼崽时期夭折。他的脑中有许多智慧，可以满足我和阿努尔夫的需求，是海加迪教会了我写诗。那些精魂珍视他的智慧，符文也愿意倾听他的声音。”

languages.text: 「スキアディ・トゥワイス・シンカー。彼は俺たちが幼くして命を落としたりしないようにするため、全知の父が送り込んだんだ。彼の頭の中には、俺とアーノルフの両方を守る秘策があった。俺に詩の作り方を教えてくれたのはスキアディだった。精霊たちは彼の知恵を高く評価し、ルーンは彼の声を思い出させた」
languages.original_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes hearkened to his voice."

traits.locale_text: 「スキアディ・トゥワイス・シンカー。彼は俺たちが幼くして命を落としたりしないようにするため、全知の父が送り込んだんだ。彼の頭の中には、俺とアーノルフの両方を守る秘策があった。俺に詩の作り方を教えてくれたのはスキアディだった。精霊たちは彼の知恵を高く評価し、ルーンは彼の声を思い出させた」

languages.text: « Quant à Skyaddi l'Avisé, il nous a été envoyé par le Père de Tous pour veiller à ce que nous ne mourions pas prématurément. Il avait suffisamment de plomb dans la cervelle pour nous trois. C'est lui qui m'a appris à composer des chansons. Les esprits tenaient sa sagesse en haute estime, et les runes écoutaient toujours ce qu'il avait à dire. »
languages.original_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes hearkened to his voice."

traits.locale_text: « Quant à Skyaddi l'Avisé, il nous a été envoyé par le Père de Tous pour veiller à ce que nous ne mourions pas prématurément. Il avait suffisamment de plomb dans la cervelle pour nous trois. C'est lui qui m'a appris à composer des chansons. Les esprits tenaient sa sagesse en haute estime, et les runes écoutaient toujours ce qu'il avait à dire. »

languages.text: "Skyaddi Zweifachdenker, nun, ihn hat der Allvater uns geschickt, damit wir nicht als junge Welpen den Tod finden. Er hatte genug Gedanken in seinem Kopf für ihn und mich und Arnoolf. Skyaddi hat mich gelehrt, Verse zu komponieren. Die Geister haben seine Weisheit ruiniert, und die Runen auf seine Stimme gehört."
languages.original_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes hearkened to his voice."

Er hatte genug Gedanken in seinem Kopf für ihn und mich und Arnoolf. Skyaddi hat mich gelehrt, Verse zu komponieren. Die Geister haben seine Weisheit ruiniert, und die Runen auf seine Stimme gehört."

languages.original_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes harkened to his voice."

languages.text: "Yücebaba, daha yavru kurtken ölüp gitmeyelim diye bize Skyaddi Çift Düşünür'ü göndermişti. Zihninde hem bana hem Arnoolf'a yetecek kadar fikir vardı. Bana şiir yazmayı Skyaddi öğretti. Ruhlar onun bilgeliğini kutsamış, rünler onun sesine kulak vermişti."
languages.original_text: "Skyaddi Twice-Thinker, well, he was sent to us by the Allfather to see that we did not meet our deaths as young pups. He had enough thoughts in that head of his to make do for me and Arnoolf both. It was Skyaddi who taught me to compose verses. The spirits prized his wisdom, and the runes hearkened to his voice."
